message:
Excellent page about IIS7.0 AppPool settings, with some nice explanations about each one of them.
they have also showed you the Micrososft.com settings used in comparision with the default value for each one.

http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc745955.aspx
story: Mohammed El Sayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Managing, Tuning, and Configuring Application Pools in IIS 7.0
caption: technet.microsoft.com
description: The Microsoft Engineering Operations (MSCOM Ops) team uses both integrated and classic requestprocessing to manage application pools in Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.0 to optimize performance and improve site availability at www.microsoft.com. In this article, we discuss how we leverage theâ€¦
